name: uwgws
description: Client Library for University of Washington's Groups Web Service
author: Marc Miles

scripts.build: npm run copy && ./node_modules/.bin/babel --presets es2015 -d lib src --source-maps inline
scripts.test: npm run build && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --bail --reporter dot --compilers js:babel-register --require babel-polyfill test/unit/*.js
scripts.debug: LOG_LEVEL=debug npm run build && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --debug-brk --bail --reporter dot --compilers js:babel-register --require babel-polyfill test/unit/*.js
